= changing the shell =

	sudo chsh -s $(which zsh) $(whoami)

=use r to repeat the last command - with substituition =

  echo one two
  r two=three
  one three

=how set up 'command not found'=

[ -r /etc/profile.d/cnf.sh ] && . /etc/profile.d/cnf.sh
